metadata.name: Powershell MsXml COM Object
metadata.comment: Adversaries may abuse PowerShell commands and scripts for execution. PowerShell is a powerful interactive command-line interface and scripting environment included in the Windows operating system. (Citation: TechNet PowerShell) Adversaries can use PowerShell to perform a number of actions, including discovery of information and execution of code

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-comobject')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('msxml2.')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('xmlhttp')))
